entry.content:
Hello, world!

I'm Erin, the author of every written thing on this website, and I'm here to extend a hand in welcome! Whether you came across this site from Google, found me on Twitter/X, or some secret third option, I hope that you find something to your liking here (even if the only thing that you like is the site itself).

More about me can be found under the About tab.

But the purpose of this post isn't to introduce myself, it's to introduce this place - home of multiple and infinite projects that are dear to me.

This page - the home page - will be where a blog of sorts resides. I'll be using it to notify everyone of updates, and occasionally churn out a piece about writing-related thoughts and inspirations.

I'll try to restrain the amount of activism that I display here, but given my own identity and the stories that I choose to tell, that may not hold.

The "What's Happening?" page lets you know what stage I am on any current projects that I'm juggling. Information includes a short description of each goal, along with a progress bar showing how far along I am. Everything else is fairly self-explanatory - a "Short Stories" page for easy access to my short stories; a "Novels" page for easy access to my novels; and a "Miscellaneous" page for any stories written in a non-traditional format, along with any articles or story collections.

Andâ€¦that's that. Feel free to give my Twitter a follow for more updates both personal and professional! See you all later!
